who.a:
Hi, I’m Rawan
I am a web developer specializing in building modern, fast, and scalable web applications.

website.q: Why does your startup need a website?
website.a: A website builds trust, gives full control over your brand, and allows customers to find and contact you at any time.

compare.a: A website is fully owned by you, ranks on Google, and presents your business professionally without platform limitations.

hero.subtitle: Building scalable web applications with modern technologies

blog.title: Blog App
blog.description: A full-stack blog application with categories, article details, and skeleton loaders.

countries.title: Around The World
countries.description: A React app that lists countries, supports search, filtering, and country details.

todo.title: Todo List
todo.description: A modern and responsive Todo application .It supports filters, drag & drop reordering, and localStorage persistence.

contact.title: Let's Create Together
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's collaborate and bring your ideas to life.
